Test Name: Melanoma Associated Retinopathy (MAR) Panel by Immunoblot and IHC
Purpose: To detect and analyze melanoma-associated retinopathy biomarkers using immunoblot and immunohistochemistry methods.
Container: Not specified (samples must be properly labeled and transported under recommended conditions)
Equipment: Immunoblot transfer apparatus, immunohistochemistry staining kit, chemiluminescence detection system, light microscope with camera, computer with imaging software
